statements: DELETE FROM SecuritySchedule WHERE personnel_id = 100 AND shift_start < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SecuritySchedule WHERE shift_end > '2022-03-15' AND personnel_id = 200;
DELETE FROM shift_assignments WHERE shift_date = '2022-10-15' AND security_personnel_id = 12345;
DELETE FROM security_personnel WHERE personnel_id = 1 AND personnel_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM shift_assignments WHERE personnel_id = 3 AND shift_date = '2022-08-15'
DELETE FROM Locations WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM ShiftLocations WHERE shift_id = 5);
